title: JBang cheatsheet (2021)
content: Here is my JBang cheatsheet which can help as a reference to code self-contained source-only Java programs with unmatched ease. Getting started with JBang Install JBang on Linux curl -Ls https://sh.jbang.dev | bash -s - app setup Create a JBang classÂ  from a template jbang init --template=hello helloworld.java List of available JBang templates jbang template ...  The post appeared first on .
